column4: hi. Why does Hardware Drivers not bring up the official ATI driver as an option? I'm stuck with opensource radeon driver that doesn't so what i need. Any ideas? Tried downloading official, but that fails too. X1300/R500 series. Many thanks....
ati removed support for many cards in their last driver release
talk to ati, or go back to an older ubuntu... nothing you can do in jaunty
